original_text: The king of Egypt made Eliakim, a brother of Jehoahaz, king over Judah and Jerusalem and changed Eliakim’s name to Jehoiakim. But Necho took Eliakim’s brother Jehoahaz and carried him off to Egypt.
korean_text: 애굽 왕 느고가 또 그의 형제 엘리아김을 세워 유다와 예루살렘 왕으로 삼고 그의 이름을 고쳐 여호야김이라 하고 그의 형제 여호아하스를 애굽으로 잡아갔더라

sentences.original_text: The king of Egypt made Eliakim
and changed Eliakim's name to Jehoiakim
But Necho took Eliakim's brother Jehoahaz
and carried him off to Egypt
